greeting_1_name: Could you tell me who you are?
scale_1_10: Could you grade that on a scale from one to ten?
explain_game: Then you choose to do a rock, paper, or scissors with your hand
Rock wins from scissors, scissors wins from paper, paper wins from rock
If we both choose the same, it's a tie
lets_start: Okay, I guess we start now.
do_you_want_play: Would you like to play a game? It's okay if you're not feeling like it.
do_you_want_play_again: Would you like to play again?
We could play again. If you want
i_win: I won, you'll do better next time
I won this time, better luck next time
i_lose: I lose, you did a great job
I lose this time. I hope to do better next time.
i_missed_it: I couldn't hear that. Could you maybe repeat?
I missed the last part. Sorry. Could you repeat it please?
I didn't get what you said. Could you maybe say it again?
